name: Eventually...
description:
A spiritual successor to my game "Just Keep..."

Controls:

A/D or Left Arrow/ Right Arrow to move horizontally.

Space or Up Arrow to swim up.

Credits:

- Sprites by Ariel Meylan ( https://www.arielmeylanart.com )

- Font by Chevy Ray ( https://chevyray.itch.io/pixel-fonts  )

- Music by Tri-Tachyon (  https://soundcloud.com/tri-tachyon/albums )
